definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: What role does it play within our perception of reality?
sentences.chinese: 在我們的現實視角中它又扮演了什麼角色？

sentences.english: It's a contrast that grows more stark when seen through the eyes of history.
sentences.chinese: 這種對比在歷史的視角下更爲了然。

sentences.english: The selling concept takes an inside-out perspective.
sentences.chinese: 推銷觀念採用一種由內而外的視角。

sentences.english: The thesis mainly demonstrates the securitization from the perspective of Cross-Border.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要從跨國性的視角向讀者展示資產證券化。

sentences.english: Now if we rotate the viewport the background image will remain still.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我們如果旋轉視角，背景圖像仍會保持靜止。

sentences.english: But Gnosticism is opposed to an historicist view of Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 但是靈知主義反對對基督教持有一種歷史主義的視角。

sentences.english: Perspective illustration provides a three-dimensional view of objects or views.
sentences.chinese: 透視畫法了對物體或景色的三維視角。

sentences.english: It can be used to configure the default language for user-defined viewpoints.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用它來爲用戶所定義的視角配置默認的語言。

sentences.english: This is a dissertation on observing the Press Conference through a visual angle of communication.
sentences.chinese: 這是一篇從宣傳學的視角觀察新聞發佈會的論文。

sentences.english: These four facets give us a complete and balanced view of prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 這四個方面給我們一個完整而平衡的視角看待成就。

sentences.english: A. New broadcast cam is wonderful, we never switched to wide.
sentences.chinese: 全新的直播視角很出色，我們從來沒有切換到寬視角。

sentences.english: A. New broadcast cam is wonderful, we never switched to wide.
sentences.chinese: 全新的直播視角很出色，我們從來沒有切換到寬視角。

sentences.english: Thirdly, it is a social viewpoint, which leads to an epistemology of multi-structure.
sentences.chinese: 三是社會的視角，導向多元結構的認識。

sentences.english: Therefore, to evaluate interregional government cooperation it is necessary to have public management point of view.
sentences.chinese: 因此，考量區域政府間合作就不能缺失公共管理視角。

sentences.english: It can change colorful auspicious light follow the visual angle.
sentences.chinese: 可以隨視角變幻出七彩祥光，魅力無窮。

definition: to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
